title: Kuo: First MacBooks With M3 Chip Unlikely to Launch This Year
content:
Apple is unlikely to release new MacBook models equipped with its next-generation M3 chip this year, according to information shared today by supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.


"It seems that Apple will not launch new MacBook models (equipped with M3 series processors) before the end of this year," said Kuo.

More details to followâ€¦
